required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of a Pre-Workout Dietary Supplement
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic, Thermogenic, Hemodynamic, Ergogenic Assessment of a Pre-Workout Dietary Supplement

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine the acute effects of a pre-workout dietary supplement on energy metabolism, cardiovascular hemodynamics, blood metabolites and mental focus.

detailed_description.textblock: A number of nutritional strategies have been developed to optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise. This includes providing carbohydrate and a number of ergogenic nutrients prior to, during and/or following exercise. As a result a number of pre-workout supplements have been developed to increase energy availability, promote vasodilation and/or positively affect exercise capacity. The purpose of this study is to investigate the potential ergogenic value of acute ingestion of a pre-workout dietary supplement prior to exercise.

primary_outcome.measure: Optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise by assessing; cognitive function (i.e., Stroop Color and Word Test and Word Recall Test).
Optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise by assessing Readiness to Perform Visual Analog Scale.
Optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise by assessing Resting Energy Expenditure.
Optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise by assessing Heart Rate.
Optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise by assessing Blood Pressure.
Optimize nutrient delivery prior to exercise by assessing ECG.

secondary_outcome.measure: Measure standard clinical chemistry panels in the blood to evaluate safety.
Measure Heart Rate to evaluate safety.
Measure Blood Pressure to evaluate safety.

arm_group.description: One dose of 12 grams (powder mixed with water): 1500 mg beta alanine, 1000 mg creatine nitrate, 1000 mg arginine AKG, 250 mg vitamin C, 150 mg n-acetyle tyrosine, 135 mg caffeine, 7.5 mg l-dopa, 30 mg vitamin B3, 10 mg synephrine, 0.5 mg vitamin B6, 0.25 mg vitamin B9, 0.035 mg vitamin B12.

One dose of 12 grams (powder mixed with water): 1500 mg beta alanine, 1000 mg creatine nitrate, 1000 mg arginine AKG, 250 mg vitamin C, 150 mg n-acetyle tyrosine, 135 mg caffeine, 7.5 mg l-dopa, 30 mg vitamin B3, 0.5 mg vitamin B6, 0.25 mg vitamin B9, 0.035 mg vitamin B12.
One dose of flavored placebo (powder mixed with water)
